test_pygraphparser.py¶

This module contains the tests to the class PyGraphParser in module PyGraphParser.

This test serves to ensure the viability of the methods of the class PyGraphParser in PyGraphParser.py.

class test_pygraphparser.TestPyGraphParser[source]¶

This class contain the test methods if the class PyGraphParser.

Methods

test_endElement()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t find the node to end.

Processes the end xml tags, according to their type. It’s a method from ContentHandler class.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If value is not the expected.
test_parse()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t find a file.

Return a PyGraph.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If the can’t find the file.
test_startElement()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t set the tag value.

Processes the opening xml tags, according to their type. It’s a method from ContentHandler class.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t set the tag value.
